original_text: that which we have seen and heard we proclaim also to you, so that you too may have fellowship with us; and indeed our fellowship is with the Father and with his Son Jesus Christ.
korean_text: 우리가 보고 들은 바를 너희에게도 전함은 너희로 우리와 사귐이 있게 하려 함이니 우리의 사귐은 아버지와 그의 아들 예수 그리스도와 더불어 누림이라

sentences.original_text: that which we have seen and heard
so that you too may have fellowship with us
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 또한 우리와 교제하게 하려는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and indeed our fellowship is with the Father
and with his Son Jesus Christ
